casebody.data:
Richmond

James E. Shepherd v. Clinchfield Coal Company. November 27, 1972. Record No. 8052.

Present, Snead, C.J., Carrico, Harrison, Cochran, Harman and Poff, JJ.

T. Munford Boyd; Don R. Pippin, for appellant. f. Thomas Fowlkes (Penn, Stuart & Eskridge, on brief), for appellee. Per Curiam.

This appeal is controlled by part I of our opinion in Doris Williams v. Clinchfield Coal Company, 213 Va. 445, 192 S.E.2d 751, this day decided.

The award of the Industrial Commission of Virginia is, therefore, affirmed.

Affirmed.
